name: iThemes Exchange – Add Product SKU
author: Visser Labs

sections.description:
This addon for iThemes Exchange adds SKU support to all Product Types.

For more information visit: http://www.visser.com.au/exchange/

Support

If you have any problems, questions or suggestions please join the members discussion on our iThemes Exchange dedicated forum.

http://www.visser.com.au/exchange/forums/

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘exchange-addon-add-product-sku’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate ‘iThemes Exchange – Add Product SKU’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open the ‘Addons’ screen through the ‘Exchange’ menu in WordPress
  4. If Add Product SKU is not enabled click Enable beside the ‘Add Product SKU’ entry in the Addons listing
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Changed: Moved to prefixed Post meta key

1.0

  • Added: Initial release
  • Added: SKU field to all Product Types on Add/Edit Product screens

screenshots.caption: Store Exporter is an iThemes Exchange compatible Addon
The SKU field appears on the Add/Edit Product screen for all Product Types
The SKU field is saved and can be used for Administration and reporting
